subtitleNullable: 107k+ News articles from last 1000 days scraped from Bangladesh Pratidin
descriptionNullable:
Currently, I'm working on a Bangla Natural Language Processing Research. And I need a lot of Bengali sentences. So I started scraping Bengali news sites.

There is 107k+ news from 13 December 2017 to 9 September 2020 in the dataset.  Which covers around a thousand days.  I used a python script to scrape the news from the site. The scraper is available [here](https://www.kaggle.com/shakirulhasan/scrape-bangladesh-protidin-news).

I'll try to contribute more to this community. If you have any confusion over the dataset, please comment. Thank you.
title: Bangla News Datasets from BD-Pratidin
subtitle: 107k+ News articles from last 1000 days scraped from Bangladesh Pratidin
description:
